title: JupyterLab for Beginners - Local Development
description: A comprehensive guide to setting up and using JupyterLab for local Python development. Learn how to install JupyterLab, create notebooks, manage extensions, work with kernels, and organize your data science projects. Each lesson includes hands-on exercises and best practices for local development workflows.
target_audience: Beginners who want to learn JupyterLab for local Python development and data science projects.
learning_objectives: Work with different Python kernels and environments
Organize projects and manage files in JupyterLab
Use JupyterLab for data analysis and visualization
prerequisites: Ability to install software on your computer

metadata.course_focus: JupyterLab setup and local development workflows
